snippet: Marcel Hirscher of Austria, the No. 1-ranked Alpine skier, overcame a first-run deficit to edge Felix Neureuther of Germany.
abstract: Top-ranked alpine skier Marcel Hirscher of Austria wins World Cup slalom race in Are, Sweden, for 26th career victory; other skiing news noted.
lead_paragraph: Marcel Hirscher of Austria, the No. 1-ranked Alpine skier, overcame a first-run deficit to edge Felix Neureuther of Germany.

headline.main: Marcel Hirscher Takes Slalom in Sweden
